title: Bug 5340 - Ineffective Cancellation of Adding Exception Breakpoint
description: This bug report is about the issue related to cancelling the addition of an exception breakpoint.
OB: The observed behavior is not specified in the report.
EB: The expected behavior is that upon clicking 'Cancel' in the progress dialog, the addition of the exception breakpoint should be effectively cancelled, and the operation should terminate immediately.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective.
2. Click the 'J!' button to add an exception.
3. In the progress dialog, click 'Cancel.'
